name: Spacehighwayman
description:
Built for Watch + Jam 5, and inspired by a waking vision of random assets drifting through space.

Play as a space-pirate (or spacehighwayman, if you will) equipped with a prototype spacevacuum - a device that safely combines the use of targeted stasis fields with a portable black hole to allow your ship to contain cargo many times larger than the ship itself.

Use your spacetorpedos to knock cargo containers free from your targeted spacefreighter, and then escape with the stolen spacegoods before the spacepolice waiting  at the end of the spacehighway clap you in spaceirons.
